name: Ironpeak Town
description: A mining town built into the foothills of towering mountains. The constant ring of hammers on metal echoes through the valleys as miners extract precious ores from the rocky peaks.

center.name: Miners' Plaza
center.description: The town center bustles with activity as miners emerge from the mountain tunnels. Carts loaded with ore rumble over cobblestone streets toward the smelting district.

buildings.name: The Pickaxe & Pint
buildings.description: A rowdy inn where miners gather after long shifts underground.

buildings.name: Mountain Ore Exchange
buildings.description: A trading post that buys raw ores and sells mining equipment.

buildings.name: Miners' Guild Hall
buildings.description: The administrative center for all mining operations in the region.

south.name: Valley Approach
south.description: The southern approach to the mining town winds through rocky valleys carved by ancient glaciers. Mine cart tracks run alongside the main road.

buildings.name: Mine Cart Station
buildings.description: A depot where mine carts are loaded and dispatched to various mining sites.
